name: ZEROculus
description:
You're pulled by a space ship. You do not control the space ship, just your own movements (First person camera).

Sit down, move your head left and right with your Rift DK2 on and enjoy the ride!

Game done in 40 hours by a team of 5, during the Virtual Jam :

https://www.facebook.com/jeremy.goncalves.796 (3d art)

https://www.facebook.com/yquem.cheesus (GD)

https://www.facebook.com/jerome.scheefer (dev)

https://www.facebook.com/marco.bollengierstragier (3d art)

https://www.facebook.com/thomas.tillard.5 (audio)

Unity project folder with all source code and assets is here:

https://github.com/schouffy/virtualjam

Feel free to reuse !
